title: Roasted Acorn Squash
directions: Trim both ends of squash then slice squash into 1/2 inch slices. Scrape away seeds and stringy pulp. Slice onions into 1/2 inch slices. Place squash and onions in large bowl, drizzle with oil and sprinkle with the spices. Carefully toss to evenly coat.
Transfer to large baking sheet. Place squash directly on sheet, place onions atop and alongside squash. Bake for 35-40 minutes until vegetables are tendered and browned on top.
